definition: to grind an iron bar down to a fine needle (idiom); fig. to persevere in a difficult task/to study diligently
grindstone/to grind/to turn round
to rub/to grind/to polish/to sharpen/to wear down/to die out/to waste time/to pester/to insist
pestle/to poke
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth

needle/pin/injection/stitch/CL:根[gen1],支[zhi1]
variant of 針|针[zhen1], needle

dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
lit. to hang one's books on cow horns (idiom)/fig. to be diligent in one's studies
dripping water penetrates the stone (idiom); constant perseverance yields success/You can achieve your aim if you try hard without giving up./Persistent effort overcomes any difficulty.
lit. to pierce the wall to steal a light (idiom)/fig. to study diligently in the face of hardship

lit. the leather binding (of the bamboo scroll) has broken three times/fig. to study diligently

definition: to grind one's way through an ink stone/to persevere in a difficult task (idiom)/to study diligently (idiom)
lit. mythical bird Jingwei tries to fill the ocean with stones (idiom); futile ambition/task of Sisyphus/determination in the face of impossible odds
